Microsoft is offering students a  discount PERIOD

In a campaign called The Ultimate Steal the computer software company is offering the Microsoft Office  Ultimate Edition for . slashed down from the original price tag of  PERIOD

The offer is valid until April  PERIOD

Students must be enrolled in at least . course credit hours at the time of purchase to qualify and are asked to use their NIU email address to prove they are college students PERIOD

Microsoft reserves the right to request a current class schedule from the university and if the student cannot produce one they will be forced to pay the full retail price PERIOD

Some think the promotion is a good opportunity PERIOD

I would buy it because it will help me succeed in school and give me the resources that other companies and businesses are looking for said junior English major Danielle Anderson PERIOD

The discount is a relief for Anderson PERIOD

Saving that much money is a very good deal and very affordable for college students Anderson said PERIOD

The Ultimate Edition includes Microsoft Word Excel PowerPoint Access Outlook the new OneNote and Publisher PERIOD
